content.raw: @ian i just finished my second try on cloudsim and i noticed that `ROS_MASTER_URI ` was not set in the container on field. Could you please provide details on how or where is that set? I tried building the image inside field and starting the container manually using the same script that runs the container,  I still couldn't see that variable.
content.html: @ian i just finished my second try on cloudsim and i noticed that ROS_MASTER_URI was not set in the container on field. Could you please provide details on how or where is that set? I tried building the image inside field and starting the container manually using the same script that runs the container, I still couldn't see that variable.
